mapper.insert: INSERT INTO productdto(cno, productName, productPrice, productStock, productDescription, productRegDate) VALUES (#{cno}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productStock}, #{productDescription}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT pno, c.cno, productName, productPrice, productStock, productDescription, productRegDate, c.categoryName FROM productdto p INNER JOIN categorydto c ON p.cno = c.cno WHERE pno = #{pno}
SELECT pno, cno, productName, productPrice, productStock, productDescription, productRegDate FROM productdto ORDER BY pno DESC
